page.title: 15HOUSING IN BROOK
page.content: There is no demand for{new estates or flats to be built in Brook as the population hardly ever expands.Nearly all the residents of Brook are{retired {couples}soon to be in their graves and therefor anyone wishing to move to the area has not got a long wait.Most of the homes in Brook are{country { cottages},and the locals would not want any new buildings to be erected in the area,they feel it would only spoil the country walks and veiws.A lot of the retired couples only use their property as summer homes.
